mapper.insert: insert into study_tb values (0, 2, #{managerUserId}, #{studyTitle}, #{studyContent}, #{studySkills}, #{studyMemberLimited}, #{studyPeriodEnd}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select st.study_id, ut.user_id, ut.nickname, st.study_title, st.study_period_end, st.study_skills, st.study_member_limited, count(srt.user_id) as member_count, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, st.study_period_end, now()) as time_count from study_tb st left outer join user_tb ut on (ut.user_id = st.manager_user_id) left outer join study_recruitment_tb srt on (srt.study_id = st.study_id) group by st.study_id;

select st.study_id, st.manager_user_id, st.study_title, st.study_content, st.study_skills, count(srt.user_id) as member_count, st.study_member_limited, st.study_period_end, st.create_date as content_create_time, ut.nickname, ut.profile_img_url, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, study_period_end, now()) as time_count, (select count(*) from study_waiting_particle_tb where study_id = #{studyId}) as waiting_member_count from study_tb st left outer join user_tb ut on (ut.user_id = st.manager_user_id) left outer join study_recruitment_tb srt on (srt.study_id = st.study_id) where st.study_id = #{studyId}
mapper.update: update study_tb set study_title = #{studyTitle}, study_content = #{studyContent}, study_skills = #{studySkills}, study_period_end = #{studyPeriodEnd}, study_member_limited = #{studyMemberLimited}, update_date = now() where study_id = #{studyId}
mapper.select: select swmt.waiting_id, swmt.study_id, swmt.user_id, ut.nickname, swmt.apply_message, swmt.create_date, ut.profile_img_url from study_waiting_member_tb swmt left outer join user_tb ut on (ut.user_id = swmt.user_id) where study_id = ${studyId}

select srt.study_recruitment_id, srt.study_id, srt.user_id, ut.nickname, ut.profile_img_url, srt.create_date from study_recruitment_tb srt left outer join user_tb ut on (ut.user_id = srt.user_id) where study_id = ${studyId}
